title: Are You Watching the Neverland Documentary?
itunes:title: Are You Watching the Neverland Documentary?
description:
2-28 - Today on the show we had a surprise get it off your chest call with Taj Jackson and Marlon Jackson the relatives of  Michael Jackson who was not so happy about the Michael Jackson "Leaving Neverland" Documentary coming out. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners are watching the documentary. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to two people that were fighting over crab legs, and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
